title: Bug 140534[Smoke]Can't changed the value of parameter use show report parameter
description: Details:[Smoke]Can't changed the value of parameter use show report parameterStep:1. New a parameter.2. Change display type to list box.3. Insert some value into selection value and set the first value to default value.4. Drop the parameter inro layout5. Preview and press show report parameter, change the value and press OK.Actual result:The value can't be changed.
